abstract: Wall Street stocks headed steadily downward as shares of investment and commercial banks fell again, giving back some of their gains from last week.
snippet: Wall Street stocks headed steadily downward as shares of investment and commercial banks fell again, giving back some of their gains from last week.
lead_paragraph: A sell-off of stocks accelerated in late trading Monday as investors moved out of shares of investment and commercial banks, many of which have given back all of their gains from last week.

headline.main: Bank Shares Retreat, Giving Up Gains
headline.print_headline: Bank Shares Retreat, Giving Up Gains
